title: The Writer's Almanac for Saturday, April 23, 2022
description: It’s the birthday of the American writer Barry Hannah (1942). He said,  “I loved the life, the secret life, of the typewriter when the house was quiet.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of the American writer Barry Hannah (1942). He said,  “I loved the life, the secret life, of the typewriter when the house was quiet.”
